Module Jtrash
Package model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The game class which handles everything related to the Trash game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int Nplayers, Utente trueUtente)
    The game constructor creates the class Giocatore which is used by the human player; then it's assigned to it the User which is the same between different games.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int Nplayers, Utente trueUtente) throws model.Game.TooManyPlayersException
      The game constructor creates the class Giocatore which is used by the human player; then it's assigned to it the User which is the same between different games. In the method players are created, same goes for the deck and then the hands of the players are populated. The first card is discarded by the deck and then useful variables are set such as the turn of the game, the trash state variable, the list of people who got a trash and the turn number of the first person getting trash.
      Parameters:
      Nplayers - , the number of players in the game
      trueUtente - , the user of the application
      Throws:
      model.Game.TooManyPlayersException - , exception if too many users are passed as input

      public void notificaObservers(int i)
      method that updates the observers as per the Observer pattern

    • drawPhase

      public void drawPhase(int inputDF, int turno) throws model.Game.ImpossibleDrawException
      the method that is used by the user to draw a card from the deck
      Parameters:
      inputDF - , the input that is equals to either the discard pile or the deck
      turno - , the current turn of the player
      Throws:
      model.Game.ImpossibleDrawException

    • turnCPU

      public void turnCPU() throws model.Game.TooManyPlayersException
      method that does the turn of every single CPU involved with the game. It's also responsible for declaring if it's the end of the manche after someone does trash, as well as checking if the CPU has done trash.
      Throws:
      model.Game.TooManyPlayersException

    • fineManche

      public void fineManche() throws model.Game.TooManyPlayersException
      method that ends the manche, making the hands of the winners smaller and recreating the initial game state while communicating with the controller class.
      Throws:
      model.Game.TooManyPlayersException

    • chooseDrawCPU

      public void chooseDrawCPU(CPU cpu)
      the method that chooses for the cpu from which place to draw (deck or discard pile).
      Parameters:
      cpu - , the cpu involved with the act of drawing

    • trashRoutine

      public void trashRoutine()
      the routine that checks if a player has done a trash, setting useful variables for the new game state Most importantly the method is also responsible for checking if the game has ended and if one of the players has won thanks to winnerResult()

      public ArrayList<GenericPlayer> getTrashPlayers()
      getter of trashPlayers
